items.title: Transparency and lawful basis for chatbot data collection
facts_summary: Chatbot collects user personal data without clear notice.
User is not informed about purposes, retention, or rights.

questions.question_text: Does the chatbot provide clear information about what personal data it collects and why?
Does the chatbot identify a lawful basis for processing and communicate it to the user?

rationale_bullets: Transparency requires clear notice about collection and purposes.
Lawful basis must be identified; communication depends on context and deployment.

items.title: Data minimization in conversational collection
facts_summary: Chatbot requests excessive personal details unrelated to user request.

questions.question_text: Is the chatbot requesting only the minimum personal data necessary to fulfill the userâ€™s request?

rationale_bullets: Data minimization requires limiting collection to what is necessary.
